org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov

Class ProvQuoteInstanceResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov.AbstractCostedResource<ProvQuoteInstance>
      • org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov.ProvQuoteInstanceResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuoteRelated<ProvQuoteInstance>

    @Service
 @Path(value="/service/prov")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class ProvQuoteInstanceResource
extends AbstractCostedResource<ProvQuoteInstance>
    The instance part of the provisioning.

      • lookup

        @GET
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/instance-lookup")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public QuoteInstanceLookup lookup(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                                                int subscription,
                                                                                                                                @DefaultValue(value="1") @QueryParam(value="cpu")
                                                                                                                                double cpu,
                                                                                                                                @DefaultValue(value="1") @QueryParam(value="ram")
                                                                                                                                int ram,
                                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="constant")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.Boolean constant,
                                                                                                                                @DefaultValue(value="LINUX") @QueryParam(value="os")
                                                                                                                                VmOs os,
                                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String type,
                                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="term")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String term,
                                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="ephemeral")
                                                                                                                                boolean ephemeral,
                                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="location")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String location,
                                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="usage")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String usage)
        Create the instance inside a quote.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier, will be used to filter the instances from the associated provider.
        cpu - The amount of required CPU. Default is 1.
        ram - The amount of required RAM, in MB. Default is 1.
        constant - Optional constant CPU. When false, variable CPU is requested. When true constant CPU is requested.
        os - The requested OS, default is "LINUX".
        type - Optional instance type name. May be null.
        term - Optional price term name. May be null.
        ephemeral - Optional ephemeral constraint. When false (default), only non ephemeral instance are accepted. Otherwise (true), ephemeral instance contract is accepted.
        location - Optional location name. May be null.
        usage - Optional usage name. May be null.
        Returns:
        The lowest price instance configurations matching to the required parameters. May be a template or a custom instance type.

      • findPriceTerm

        @GET
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/instance-price-term")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.json.TableItem<ProvInstancePriceTerm> findPriceTerm(@PathParam(value="subscription")

      • computeFloat

        public FloatingCost computeFloat(double base,
                                 ProvQuoteInstance instance)
        Compute the cost using minimal and maximal quantity of related instance. no rounding there.
        Parameters:
        base - The cost of one instance.
        instance - The quote instance to compute.
        Returns:
        The updated cost of this instance.

      • upload

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="multipart/form-data")
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/upload")
public void upload(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                            int subscription,
                                                                                                            java.io.InputStream uploadedFile,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String[] columns,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String term,
                                                                                                            java.lang.Integer ramMultiplier,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String encoding)
                                                                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Upload a file of quote in add mode.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier, will be used to filter the locations from the associated provider.
        uploadedFile - Instance entries files to import. Currently support only CSV format.
        columns - the CSV header names.
        term - The default ProvInstancePriceTerm used when no one is defined in the CSV line
        ramMultiplier - The multiplier for imported RAM values. Default is 1.
        encoding - CSV encoding. Default is UTF-8.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the CSV stream cannot be written.

      • newUpdateCost

        public UpdatedCost newUpdateCost(ProvQuoteInstance entity)
        Request a cost update of the given entity and report the delta to the the global cost. The changes are persisted.
        Parameters:
        entity - The quote instance to update.
        Returns:
        The new computed cost.
